title: Day 1 - Part 1: Self-confidence is believing in yourself, your abilities, your talents and knowing that...

attachments.displayName: Day 1 - Part 1: Self-confidence is believing in yourself, your abilities, your talents and knowing that you can do anything that you put your mind to. Self-confidence affects all facets of your life and interpersonal relationships including: familial, friendships and professional. Self-confidence is enhanced by loving yourself, knowing your value and believing in your worth. Having self-confidence indicates that you have the awareness, knowledge and acceptance of your strengths and weakness with an innate understanding that perfection is not to be expected because to err is what makes us human.

Having self-confidence indicates that you have the awareness, knowledge and acceptance of your strengths and weakness with an innate understanding that perfection is not to be expected because to err is what makes us human.
